arts.ttl: South Korea vs. Bolivia video highlights (2-0), Lee and the Koreans deliver
arts.sum: Watch the highlights of South Korea vs. Bolivia, featuring goals from Son Heung-min and Cho Gue-sung. South Korea faced Bolivia in a friendly match at Daejeon Stadium this Friday. One Paris Saint-Germain player was on the Korean side: Lee Kang-in (24-year-old attacking midfielder/winger). He started in South Korea’s victory. Watch the South Korea vs. Bolivia […]

arts.ttl: South Korea vs Bolivia – Official lineups: Lee starts
arts.sum: In a friendly match, South Korea will face Bolivia at Daejeon Stadium this Friday (kick-off at 12:00 PM CET). One Paris Saint-Germain player will be playing for South Korea: Lee Kang-In (24-year-old attacking midfielder/winger). The Parisian is in the starting lineup.
